transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Ye capture plate wala thodi hai sir aap?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan sir kya sir arrange baat kar raha tha India Mart se kaise hai?
Executive: Haan acha hai boliye sir. Parso parso baat hua tha mera aapse yaad hoga rain drops pe aapka equipment offer hua tha.
Customer: Sir wo capture plate equipment ka mere se baat kar raha tha.
Executive: Haan haan haan capture plate equipment ke liye hi baat hua tha aapse. So aapke catalog pe jo pages mein equipment mein jo products dale hue the, right? Maine kuch naye products aur add karaye aapke. Abhi aapke catalog mein na almost 32 products ho gaye. Right? Pehle bhi kuch 10 se 12 products the. To maine capture plate ka na pura brochure download kiya tha. To main check kar raha tha jis jis category mein hum log deal kar rahe hain, right? Usi usi category mein unke kuch majorly products add kiye 10 se 12 products hain. Wo sare products as it is maine aapke profile mein bhi abhi add on karaya hai. Theek hai? Usse kya hai ki jo jo buyleads
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir ye mera job hai definitely mujhe karna hi hai. To abhi main sir basically kya kar raha hu jo products main add kiye hai aap agar check karenge usme kuch products mein pages missing hai, right sir? To request karunga ki aap wo jo images hai aapke paas high definition, right? Wo waha par add kar dijiye aur kuch kuch products mein description missing hai sir, right? Please wo description add kijiye. Problem abhi jaise maine kal ye product add kiye abhi aaj bhi kuch aur product add honge. To maan ke chaliyega within four five days mein, right? Fir se ek baar check karke ki kya kuch rebuild hota hai, kuch inquiries generate hota hai, right? So that aapke paas wo response generate ho sake. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay, thank you sir.
Executive: Aur baki baki agar koi dikkat problem rehta hai sir mera number aapke paas hai WhatsApp pe bhi aap mujhe directly bhi approach kar lijiye.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
Executive: Main ye call sir aapka rain drops aur capture pe close kar raha tha sir mera feedback aayega aapke paas. Please mera feedback share kar dijiye. Theek hai?
Customer: Sure, humesha, surely.
Executive: Thank you so much sir. Haan ji.
Customer: Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to add images to products.

- Customer needs to add descriptions to products.



Resolution:

- Executive added new products to customer's catalog.

- Executive requested to add missing images and descriptions.

- Executive assured support via WhatsApp for any issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, products, images, description, feedback
